content:
The new code chunk adds a 'Wireframe' toggle button to an existing options frame in a graphical interface for 3D scene manipulation. This functionality complements other toggling options like undo and redo, allowing users to switch between wireframe and solid rendering modes.

</document>

self.toggleWireframeButton = tk.Button(
            toggleFrame,
            text = 'Wireframe',
            command = ShowBaseGlobal.base.toggleWireframe)
        self.toggleWireframeButton.pack(fill = tk.X, expand = 1)
        toggleFrame.pack(side = tk.LEFT, fill = tk.X, expand = 1)
